pageContext.title: Numeric Separators For Large Integers in Javascript
pageContext.content:
![numeric_sep.png](https://media.graphcms.com/WzpGqMapTwWFUzFKfx8A#noshadow)

I never knew that you could use underscores to make large numbers more readable! The example above is contrived but I can think of a few situations where using this separation for integer readability could be helpful.

Pretty fun.
